Job Title: Sales Estimator

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Project Management, Quality Assurance, Sales

Description:
Sales EstimatorSalary + Commission + Company Vehicle!!
Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT is a global leader in disaster restoration. From initial clean-up to complete rebuilds, Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT is there every step of the way. We work on multi-million dollar commercial projects as well as several thousand dollar residential losses and everything in between. Founded in 1948, we have a long-standing reputation as a leader in our industry.
We are a team built on high energy, high performing individuals who work together to maintain Blackmon Mooring / BMSCAT as an industry leader.
Position SummaryAs a Sales Estimator for us, you will be responsible for estimating mitigation work relating to fire, flood and other losses occurring to residential or commercial properties. You will work in close contact with the insurance company, the adjusters, and the property owner to assure the project is bid accurately and competitively. You will build long-term relationships with adjusters and insurance companies to assure that job opportunities are referred to you for estimating.
Essential Functions This position will allow you to interact with both commercial and residential property owners, insurance adjusters and TPA’s. You will have the opportunity to work on projects ranging from a few thousand dollars up to multi-million dollars. With this position, your earnings potential is only capped by your own drive and hard work!
Experience and Skill RequirementsTo succeed in this role, you must have a minimum of two years, hands-on experience estimating both residential and commercial mitigation projects. You must have strong organizational skills and be team oriented. Xactimate software estimating experience is highly preferred.  The ability to communicate with property owners, both residential and commercial is very important. Experience working with both time and material estimating is also helpful.
CompensationAs a Sales Estimator - PJC you will receive a guaranteed base plus commissions based on each project’s profitability. Your compensation will vary by experience level. This can be discussed during the first interview. In addition, you will be provided with a company vehicle, gas card, EZ pass or Toll Tag, lap-top, smart phone and all the tools you will need to assure success. We provide fully paid employee medical insurance, optional dental and optical, a 401 (k) plan and more.
If this sounds like you, please APPLY TODAY!
You can text "BMSjobs" to 25000 and ask questions or start the process.
BMS CAT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
